li.p: transform_view::iterator has an exposition-only member current_ ()
transform_view::sentinel has an exposition-only member end_ ()

blockquote.p: Effects: Equivalent to: return x.end_ - y.current_;

discussion.p: x is an iterator, so it has current_, not end_. y is a sentinel, so it has end_, not current_.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4849.
